item.title: Basic Statistics
item.description: Basic Statistics # Below, we plot the network, excluding singleton nodes: The plot is indeed interesting. Further, we present the degree distribution of the network. Here is the in-degree distribution: And here is the out-degree distribution: How about that, Ganon?
Community Detection # We have used Louvain Partition to make communities. Compare this to the partition based on field Note that this is based on the GCC.
